title: Travel through the Mountain Pass
content:
Travel through the Mountain Pass Type Quest Act Act I Location ROSYMORN MONASTERY Reward

Travel through the Mountain Pass

Travel through the Mountain Pass is a Quest in Baldur's Gate 3. Travel through the Mountain Pass can be acquired during Act I and is a part of the Main Quest: Travel to Moonrise Towers. Completing Quests allows players to learn more about the world and characters in Baldur's Gate 3 and earn more loot and experience to become more powerful.

Travel through the Mountain Pass Objectives

Reach the mountain pass.

Halsin told us that there is a way to Moonrise Towers through a mountain pass, but that it may be dangerous.

Speak to Minthara in the Goblin Camp.

True Soul Nere spoke of a General who resides in Moonrise Towers. If we want answers about our parasites, we'll need to head there. Minthara in the Goblin Camp knows of a way to safely traverse the cursed lands.

Raid the Emerald Grove.

We agreed to help Minthara raid the Emerald Grove.

Celebrate with Minthara.

Minthara has promised us a reward for helping her crush the Emerald Grove. We should meet her at our camp to celebrate - and to receive our prize.

Travel through the mountain pass.

Nere warned us that we cannot travel through the mountain pass without protection, but Minthara can no longer help us. We might just have to brave the curse. Minthara told us of a creature in her service who can guide us safely to Moonrise Towers. We can meet him and his minions at the mountain pass.

Follow the mountain pass.

We decided to take the mountain pass. This road should lead us to Moonrise Towers. We decided to take the mountain pass. This road should lead us to Moonrise Towers.

Quest Complete Descriptions

We took the mountain pass and arrived in the shadow-cursed lands. We used the lift in Grymforge and arrived in the shadow-cursed lands.

Travel through the Mountain Pass Walkthrough

You can travel to Ruined Battlefield through Rosymorn Monastery The quest in the region include Lae'zel's personal quest The Githyanki Warrior and Find the Blood of Lathander, Steal a Githyanki Egg.

How to unlock Travel through the Mountain Pass

Travel through the Mountain Pass Rewards
